All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Block
Defines a generic type of block and it's properties
BlockAdapter
Implements the JsonDeserializer interface for the abstract class Block
BlockMoveListener
Implementing this interface allows an object to get information about all the blocks that ar moved on the game board
BlockType
Provides objects that describe all the possible type of blocks
Board
Defines all the game core functionality, including block managing and moving
BoardComponent
Defines the ui for the board class
BsonParser
Provides a custom parser between the block class and the Bson objects using the Gson library
Constants
Defines constants used inside the code base
Credentials
Provides the database object with credentials for the MongoDB servers
Dashboard
Defines all the widgets that the player can interact with
DashboardComponent
Defines the ui for the dashboard class
DbErrorDialog
Defines a dialog window used when a database error occurs
Direction
Provides objects that describe the four cardinal directions
GsonFileParser
Defines an object that can interact with Json files outside the program using the Gson library
HintSchema
Defines a schema for the hint collection inside the database
HintSchemaCodec
Implements the Codec interface for the HintSchema object
HintSchemaCodecProvider
Implements the CodecProvider for the HintSchema object
IOUtils
Defines utility methods to save and load various types of file
JsonFileChooser
Defines a dialog that the user can use to visually save and load Json file on his computer
LargeBlock
Defines the large block extending the abstract block
LevelSchema
Defines a schema for the level collection inside the database
LevelSelectorDialog
Defines a dialog window used when the user wants to select a new level to play
Main
Provides the Java entry point for the entire program
MongoDbConnection
Provides all the functionality to exchange data from and to the database
Move
Defines object that describe a movement of a block
MoveCodec
Implements the Codec interface for the Move object
MoveCodecProvider
Implements the CodecProvider interface for the Move object
MovePerformedListener
Implementing this interface allows an object to get information about things that need to happen as a result of a block being moved
PageCounter
Defines a custom ui element used to indicate which page is currently shown
PointCodec
Implements the Codec interface for the Point object
PointUtils
Utilities class for point operations.
PostGameActionsListener
Implementing this interface allows a Dashboard object to execute commands when a button press happens
PostGameDialog
Defines a dialog window used when the player wins the game
SmallBlock
Defines the small block extending the abstract block
Solver
Provides an algorithm to evaluate the best move for any given board state
SolverPiece
Defines a smaller version of the Block class with fewer information stored to speed up the solver execution
StyledButton
Defines a new button with custom styling
StyledButtonUI
Defines a custom ui used in custom buttons
StyledLabel
Defines a new label with custom styling
StyledLabelUI
Defines a custom ui used in custom labels
WideBlock
Defines the wide block extending the abstract block
Window
Defines the main window for the program's gui
